abstract: Citigroup is looking for a buyer for the former Travelers Group headquarters in lower Manhattan, which could fetch up to $1.8 billion, as part of a larger effort to reduce its real estate holdings.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup is looking for a buyer for the former Travelers Group headquarters in lower Manhattan, which could fetch up to $1.8 billion, as part of a larger effort to reduce its real estate holdings.

headline.main: Citi Puts Former Travelers Tower Up for Sale
